author: Arian Campo-Flores
title: Florida Gov. Scott Signs Gun-Control, School-Safety Bill
text:
Florida Gov. Rick Scott on Friday signed into law a bill that includes the first significant gun restrictions in the firearm-friendly state in decades, nearly a month after the deadly school shooting at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, Fla.

Joined in Tallahassee by family members of the 17 people killed in the Feb. 14 massacre, Mr. Scott said he weighed three factors in analyzing the legislation: whether it would improve school safety; provide more funding for mental-health treatment; and keep guns away from...
